document.full_text: shareholders ratcheted up pressure on nyse euronext to wrangle a better takeover deal than the one it has with deutsche boerse by using a rival bid to its advantage.
document.title: investors press nyse to capitalize on bid battle
lines_and_colors: shareholders ratcheted up pressure on nyse euronext to wrangle a better takeover deal than the one it has with deutsche boerse by using a rival bid to its advantage.
